pull_request.title: jstage.jst.go.jp
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

> STILL unable to find an annoyances filter to enable. can someone point me in the right direction?

Press AdGuard icon at the bottom => `Safari Protection` => `Filters` and choose `Annoyances`. Then select a required filter.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://patreon.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpatreon.com) ### Comment Username: @infinitewaveparticle > First of all, in the AdGuard app, I selected "Missed ad or tracker", but when this form was loaded there was no option to select "Missed tracker". Anyway, this report is to let you know that there is a tracker in Patreon emails for when you choose to load remote content (images, etc). The tracking server is shown in the screenshot as blocked because I have manually added it to the user filter. I suggest that you add it to your DNS and regular lists as well. The server is "email.mailgun.patreon.com" and is used to track users who load their emails. Please block it. Blocking it manually has not affected the images loading in the emails. ### Screenshots

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable it or add this rule:
```adblock
pokemonshowdown.com#@#.buttonbar
```
to user rules.

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.44.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://shinden.pl/episode/59474-youkoso-jitsuryoku-shijou-shugi-no-kyoushitsu-e-2nd-season/view/212737?r307=1#

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Annoyances, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard, Polish Social Filters, KAD - Anti-Scam, Polish Annoyances Filters, Polish Anti Adblock Filters, Polish Anti-Annoying Special Supplement, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. When the ``AdGuard Annoyances`` filter is enabled, the site detects uBlock. 
Filter that fixes but displays information about cookies.

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4(965)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://namu.wiki/w/%EC%9D%8C%ED%8C%8C%20%ED%81%AC%EB%9E%98%EC%8B%9C%20%EB%B2%84%EA%B7%B8?from=%EB%BD%81%EC%B0%A1

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
The embedded player detects AdGuard in the namu.wiki document where Kakao TV's video is attached.
>@@||videoads.kakao.com^
>@@||videoads.kakao.com/adserver/api/v2/vmap$domain=tv.kakao.com|play->tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net|namu.wiki
>@@||kakaotv.daum.net/embed/player/image/ads.png$domain=tv.kakao.com|play-tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net|namu.wiki
namu.wiki,kakaotv.daum.net,play-tv.kakao.com,tv.kakao.com#@#ins.kakao_ad_area
namu.wiki,kakaotv.daum.net,play-tv.kakao.com,tv.kakao.com#@##adBlockPixelTag
namu.wiki,kakaotv.daum.net,play-tv.kakao.com,tv.kakao.com#@#.banner_ad
@@||tv.kakao.com/embed/player/image/ads.png$domain=tv.kakao.com|play-tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net|namu.wiki

Even if you add the above user rules, if you exclude Kakao TV's website, AdGuard is detected and blocked.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![4FE947B4-F034-4680-BB0F-855546BF74FA](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/196236384-d08d7a29-40d7-4e78-bc2f-9a53f66116bf.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![1BB066A5-5C34-464B-9058-4704A19A16B3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/196236461-0a82d930-f0a4-414b-997c-ac1296db7319.png)

</details>

issue.title: namu.wiki
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4(965)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://namu.wiki/w/%EC%9D%8C%ED%8C%8C%20%ED%81%AC%EB%9E%98%EC%8B%9C%20%EB%B2%84%EA%B7%B8?from=%EB%BD%81%EC%B0%A1

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
The embedded player detects AdGuard in the namu.wiki document where Kakao TV's video is attached.
>@@||videoads.kakao.com^
>@@||videoads.kakao.com/adserver/api/v2/vmap$domain=tv.kakao.com|play->tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net|namu.wiki
>@@||kakaotv.daum.net/embed/player/image/ads.png$domain=tv.kakao.com|play-tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net|namu.wiki
namu.wiki,kakaotv.daum.net,play-tv.kakao.com,tv.kakao.com#@#ins.kakao_ad_area
namu.wiki,kakaotv.daum.net,play-tv.kakao.com,tv.kakao.com#@##adBlockPixelTag
namu.wiki,kakaotv.daum.net,play-tv.kakao.com,tv.kakao.com#@#.banner_ad
@@||tv.kakao.com/embed/player/image/ads.png$domain=tv.kakao.com|play-tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net|namu.wiki

Even if you add the above user rules, if you exclude Kakao TV's website, AdGuard is detected and blocked.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![4FE947B4-F034-4680-BB0F-855546BF74FA](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/196236384-d08d7a29-40d7-4e78-bc2f-9a53f66116bf.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![1BB066A5-5C34-464B-9058-4704A19A16B3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/196236461-0a82d930-f0a4-414b-997c-ac1296db7319.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I cannot reproduce with AdGuard Browser Extension and the following user rules to simulate @Githubmaniak's AdGuard configuration [^1]. 

```adblock
@@||videoads.kakao.com/adserver/api/v*/vmap|$domain=tv.kakao.com|play-tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net
@@/embed/player/image/ads.png$domain=tv.kakao.com|play-tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net
@@||tv.kakao.com^$jsinject
/embed/player/image/ads.png$redirect=2x2-transparent.png,domain=tv.kakao.com|play-tv.kakao.com|kakaotv.daum.net,badfilter

```

[^1]: I don't have any Apple device currently. And, @Githubmaniak uses free version of AdGuard for iOS.
